book.publisher: Vintage/Ebury (A Division of Random House Group)
book.synopsis: 1995, hardcover reprint edition, Leopard Books, London. Oversized, 192 pages, pictorial endpapers (reproducing covers of the magazine during the 1930s and 1940s).
book.title_long: The Home Front: The Best of Good Housekeeping 1939-1945
